text: Paul Kauvar was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. He won the 1897 Preakness Stakes. He was sold to Louis Ezell for $1,500 in 1898, but was injured before the Colombia Stakes in October. ==References== Category:Thoroughbred family A12 Category:Racehorses bred in the United States Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:1894 racehorse births
title: Paul Kauvar
